CustomField.description: When True, an existing schedule held on a resource request is reused for a subsequent assignment on that request rather than creating a new schedule for the assignment. The default value is False.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When True, an existing schedule held on a resource request is reused for a subsequent assignment on that request rather than creating a new schedule for the assignment. The default value is False.
CustomField.label: Retain Schedule On Assign
